snippet: BATS Global Markets, the third-largest stock exchange operator in the United States, is on track for an initial public offering that will give it a market value of $810 million.
abstract: BATS Global Markets, the third-largest stock exchange operator in the United States, is on track for an initial public offering that will give it a market value of $810 million.

headline.main: BATS Global Markets Aims to Price I.P.O. at $16 to $18
